column1: Narrator : The island is made of small hills surrounded by rocky cliffs.
Narrator : A sign pointing to a path reads : « Weapons of all kinds »

column13: OtherSpeak : You scum will taste my finest choice!

column3: Choice : Ever heard of the treasure of NOMTRESOR?
column8: Choice : How are things on your island? (quest)
column10: Choice : Tell me about the ocean !

column4: OtherSpeak : Nope, first time I hear about it!
column11: OtherSpeak : I’d prefer we talk business only

column8: OtherSpeak : I never get to see what people do with my weapons.
column13: PlayerSpeak : The weapons vendor is dead!

column8: OtherSpeak : Which suits me fine to be honest.
